title: Login Issues - Can’t Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log into their account. They’ve tried multiple times but password keeps failing.

title: Payment Failed - Card Declined
description: Customer attempting to pay via Visa ending 1234 but the payment fails. Suggests contacting their bank.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: Customer cannot download their January invoice from the billing section. Download button not responsive.

title: App Crash on Launch
description: Customer reports that the mobile app crashes immediately when opening after update 2.3.0.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Issue
description: Customer not receiving authentication codes for login verification on registered phone number.

title: Subscription Auto-Renewal
description: Customer subscription auto-renewed without prior notification and they want to cancel.

title: Incorrect Billing Address
description: Customer’s billing address shows as different city. They updated it but still displays the old one.

title: Refund Not Processed
description: Customer requested a refund two weeks ago but has not received the amount yet.

title: Unable to Update Profile Picture
description: Customer tried to upload a new profile picture but it does not save.

title: Missing Order Confirmation Email
description: Customer placed an order but didn’t receive a confirmation email. Checked spam folder too.

title: Slow Website Loading
description: Customer reports website pages load very slowly during checkout process.

title: Discount Code Not Working
description: Customer tried applying a valid discount code but it shows invalid error.

title: Account Locked
description: Customer’s account locked due to multiple failed login attempts. Needs unlocking.

title: Duplicate Charges
description: Customer was charged twice for the same subscription renewal.

title: Notification Settings Not Saving
description: Customer updated notification preferences but changes don’t persist after saving.
